member.name: T:Ikon.Utilities.Indentation
member.summary: Indentation helper.

member.name: M:Ikon.Utilities.Indentation.ToString
member.summary: Gets indentation string.

member.name: M:Ikon.Utilities.Indentation.Increase
member.summary: Increases indentation by one level.

member.name: M:Ikon.Utilities.Indentation.Decrease
member.summary: Decreases indentation by one level.

member.name: T:Ikon.Composer
member.summary: Base class for IKON composers. Composers transform IKON values to a text.

member.name: M:Ikon.Composer.#ctor(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Constructs basic IKON composer.

member.name: M:Ikon.Composer.Write(Ikon.Value)
member.summary: Writes an IKON value to the output stream.

member.name: M:Ikon.Composer.Write(Ikon.Value,System.String[])
member.summary: Writes an IKON value with reference names to the output stream.

member.name: M:Ikon.Composer.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Appends a text to the current line. Text entered with this method is buffered and is not written immediately to the output stream. To finalize the buffered data (and write it to output stream) call either EndLine or WrtieLine.

member.name: M:Ikon.Composer.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Appends a text to the current line and writes buffered line to the output stream.

member.name: M:Ikon.Composer.EndLine
member.summary: Writes buffered line to the output stream.

member.name: P:Ikon.Composer.Writer
member.summary: Output stream where IKON values are being written.

member.name: P:Ikon.Composer.Indentation
member.summary: Indentation level.

member.name: P:Ikon.Composer.Line
member.summary: Temporary line contents.

member.name: T:Ikon.IValueFactory
member.summary: Interface for IKON value factories usable by IKON parser.

member.name: M:Ikon.IValueFactory.Parse(Ikon.Parser)
member.summary: Parses input for a IKON value.

member.name: P:Ikon.IValueFactory.Sign
member.summary: Character that identifies value parcable by factory.

member.name: T:Ikon.Utilities.HelperMethods
member.summary: Helper class with utility methods for parsing and composing text streams with IKON syntax.

member.name: F:Ikon.Utilities.HelperMethods.EndOfStreamResult
member.summary: Value that System.IO.TextReader read methods return when end of the stream is reached.

member.name: F:Ikon.Utilities.HelperMethods.ReferenceSign
member.summary: Character that marks the beginning of the reference name.

member.name: M:Ikon.Utilities.HelperMethods.ParseReferences(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Returns all consequentive reference names from the current state of the input stream.

member.name: M:Ikon.Utilities.HelperMethods.ParseIdentifier(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Skips whitespaces and reads an identifier from the input stream. Throws System.FormatException if there is no valid identifier.

member.name: M:Ikon.Utilities.HelperMethods.NextNonwhite(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Reads input for the next non-white character. Throws System.FormatException if end of stream is reached before a such character.

member.name: M:Ikon.Utilities.HelperMethods.SkipWhiteSpaces(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Skips consequentive whitespace characters from the input.

member.name: T:Ikon.Parser
member.summary: Basic parser for texts streams with IKON syntax.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.#ctor(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Constructs parser without registerd value factories.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.#ctor(System.IO.TextReader,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Ikon.IValueFactory})
member.summary: Constructs parser and registers value factories to it.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.RegisterFactory(Ikon.IValueFactory)
member.summary: Registers a value factory to the parser. If parser already has a factory with the same sign, it will be replaced.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.ParseAll
member.summary: Parses whole input stream.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.HasNext
member.summary: Checks whether parser can read more IKON values from the input stream.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.ParseNext
member.summary:
Parses and returns next IKON value from the input stream.
Throws System.IO.EndOfStreamException if end of the input stream is encountered while parsing.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.ReadChar
member.summary: Reads next character from the input stream.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.SkipWhiteSpaces
member.summary: Skips consequentive whitespace characters from the input stream.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.ReadIdentifier
member.summary: Reads the input stream for an IKON identifier. Throws System.FormatException if there is no valid identifier.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.ReadNextNonwhite
member.summary: Reads the input stream for the next non-whitespace character. Throws System.FormatException if end of stream is reached before a such character.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.GetNamedValue(System.String)
member.summary:
Returns the IKON value with specified reference name.
Throws System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException if such value doesn't exist.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.TryParseNext
member.summary:
Trys to parse next IKON value from the input stream.
Throws System.FormatException if there is no value factory that can parse curren state of the input.
member.returns: Return an IKON value if there is one, null otherwise.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the System.IO.TextReader and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Ikon.Parser.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:Ikon.Parser.Factories
member.summary: Collection on value factories.

member.name: P:Ikon.Parser.NamedValues
member.summary: Collection of named objects.

member.name: P:Ikon.Parser.Reader
member.summary: Input stream that is being parsed.

member.name: P:Ikon.Parser.CanRead
member.summary: Indicates whether is it possible to read another character from the input stream.

member.name: P:Ikon.Parser.PeakReader
member.summary: Gets next character in the input stream without moving to the next.

member.name: T:Ikon.Utilities.WhiteSpaceSkipResult
member.summary: Describes whitespace skipping run.

member.name: F:Ikon.Utilities.WhiteSpaceSkipResult.EndOfStream
member.summary: Skipping whitespaces encountered end of stream/input.

member.name: F:Ikon.Utilities.WhiteSpaceSkipResult.NonwhiteChar
member.summary: Skipping whitespaces has found non-whitespace character.

member.name: T:Ikon.Value
member.summary: Base class for IKON values.

member.name: M:Ikon.Value.Compose(Ikon.Composer)
member.summary: Writes an IKON value to the composer.

member.name: P:Ikon.Value.TypeName
member.summary: Type name of the IKON value instance.
